mode.description: 运行模式，例如 'sandbox' 或 'production' (Operating mode)

accessToken.description: 用户的访问令牌 (User's access token)

orderInfo.description: 订单的详细业务数据 (Detailed business data for the order)

paymentMethod.description: 支付类型: 0=预充值, 1=信用额度 (Payment method: 0 for Prepaid, 1 for Credit)

shipFrom.description: 发货地址信息 (Origin address information)

shipTo.description: 收货地址信息 (Destination address information)
